author: @ratanUtube1
text: Hi Krish, Great Content. Just one doubt from my side. In your cell number 11, I guess we need to do value count on ISBN column instead of bookRating like below.  counts1 = ratings['userID'].value_counts() ratings = ratings[ratings['userID'].isin(counts1[counts1 >= 200].index)] counts = ratings['ISBN'].value_counts() ratings = ratings[ratings['ISBN'].isin(counts[counts >= 100].index)]  as we are trying to eliminate the books which have been rated less than 100times. Please correct me if I am wrong.
